Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins.AbstractBasePlugin

  • Packages that use AbstractBasePlugin 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client
    Main package with all charts implementation, global classes and common interfaces.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.data
    Contains all elements to configure the datasets of a chart instance (know as chart data at instance level).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins
    Contains some plugins implementations, available out-of-the box.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins
    Contains all classes to manage the plugin implementations.

    • Uses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client

      Subclasses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  Defaults.NativeChartHandler
      Internal plugin to track native chart instances on all charts.

    • Uses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client.data

      Subclasses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client.data 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  CanvasObjectHandler
      Internal plugin, set by data object before a chart is initializing.
      This plugin is added to the chart ONLY if the data set is configured to have patterns and gradients.
      It cleans up where the chart is destroyed or resized.

    • Uses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

      Subclasses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  ChartBackgroundColorPlugin
      A plugin implementation to set the background color, gradient or pattern of chart.
      If added to defaults, without any configuration, the chart will have a ChartBackgroundColor.DEFAULT_BACKGROUND_COLOR background color.

    • Uses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins

      Subclasses of AbstractBasePlugin in org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SmartPlugin
      Wraps a plugin, delegating the execution of all hooks to it.
      the needed hooks can be added and CHART.JS will invoke only those hooks, improving the drawing performance.
      (package private) class  WrapperPlugin
      Wraps a plugin, delegating the execution of all hooks to it.
      The wrapper is mandatory to enable catching all hooks of chart even if the plugin implements just a part of the hooks.
      Fields in org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins with type parameters of type AbstractBasePlugin 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Map<String,​AbstractBasePlugin> GlobalPlugins.pluginIds  
      private List<AbstractBasePlugin> Plugins.pluginsInstances  
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.plugins with parameters of type AbstractBasePlugin 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void Plugins.addBasePlugin​(AbstractBasePlugin plugin)
      Adds a new plugin to the chart.
      If another plugin instance with the same id has been already loaded, it will remove, storing the new one.
      If the chart is already initialized, to get this update the chart must be drawn again.
      (package private) void JsPluginHelper.register​(AbstractBasePlugin object)
      Register new plugin.
      private boolean GlobalPlugins.registerBasePlugin​(AbstractBasePlugin plugin)
      Registers a plugin as global, to apply to all charts.
